translation: Knowing that thou shalt not, O Arjuna, again be deluded like this; and by that thou shalt see all beings in thyself and also in me.
commentary: 4.35 that which? knowing having known? Not not? Again again? Moham delusion? Evam thus? will you go will get? Pandavas Or Pandavas? Yen by this? Bhootani beings? Infinitely all? You shall see (thou) shalt see? Atmani in (thy) Self? Atho also? Mayi in Me.Commentary That? the knowledge of the Self mentioned in the previous verse? that is to be learned from the Brahmanishtha Guru through prostration? stationing and service.
